conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D axonometric projection with clear wall thickness and cutaway treatment.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent height/thickness and clean cutaway geometry. Minimal perspective distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout is recognizable, but significant exterior features (Decks/Balconies) are omitted. Room adjacencies for Bed-3/Bed-4 and bathroom locations have been simplified or merged.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture types correctly identified and placed in corresponding zones. Scale is consistent.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering style. Consistent material usage. Lack of text labels allows for high clarity.

detected_errors.description: Both external 'Deck' areas from the original plan are completely missing from the 3D model.
Internal wall geometry in the bottom-right bathroom/utility zone is simplified and missing several partitions.

summary: A high-quality 3D transformation that preserves the core interior layout and furniture logic, though it omits exterior balcony spaces.
